_comment: Captain definitions. Each captain has a passive (stat bonuses) and an active ability (template-based). Passive effects are applied as flat bonuses at run start.

captain_nightmare.name: Captain Nightmare
captain_nightmare.description: The self-proclaimed most dangerous pilot in the sector — all bravado, no brain, and somehow it works. Fueled by cold drinks from Starbase Recreatia-7 and a talent for turning bad decisions into collateral damage.

captain_finswick.name: Gerald "The Hedge" Finswick
captain_finswick.description: A former insurance risk assessor who quit his desk job and became nearly unkillable through sheer bureaucratic caution. Every shield is filed in triplicate and every hull repair comes with a warranty.

active_ability.name: Emergency Shields
active_ability.description: Become invulnerable for 3 seconds and restore 30% max HP.

captain_zoltan.name: Zoltan the Destroyer
captain_zoltan.description: A.K.A. The Prime Ruler. A xenon-breathing, Synthetic Bload-fueled Balsurpian conqueror whose greatest weapon isn't his five combat tentacles — it's convincing your army to join his.

active_ability.name: Subjugation
active_ability.description: Convert nearby enemies into loyal minions for 8 seconds. Converted enemies attack their former allies.

captain_spectra.name: S.P.E.C.T.R.A.
captain_spectra.description: The Digital Diva of the Metaverse. A highly sophisticated AI created by J.A.Y. Industries with a British accent and zero patience for organic incompetence.

active_ability.name: Overclock
active_ability.description: Overclock all weapon systems for 5 seconds: +50% fire rate and +2 projectiles per volley.
